title: Bun-Scan Configuration
description: Configuration file for bun-scan vulnerability scanner with support for multiple data sources

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE support

source.description: Vulnerability data source: 'osv' (OSV.dev), 'npm' (npm Registry), or 'both' (query both and deduplicate)

ignore.description: Vulnerability IDs to ignore globally (e.g., CVE-*, GHSA-*)

items.description: Vulnerability identifier (CVE, GHSA, PYSEC, GO, RUSTSEC)

additionalProperties.description: Ignore rules for a specific package

vulnerabilities.description: Vulnerability IDs to ignore for this package

until.description: Expiration date for this ignore rule (ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2024-12-31). After this date, the vulnerability will be reported again.

reason.description: Documentation of why this vulnerability is being ignored
examples: Not affected - feature not used in this project
Accepted risk - low impact in our context

logLevel.description: Logging verbosity level. Note: Due to logger initialization timing, use BUN_SCAN_LOG_LEVEL environment variable for runtime control.

bunReportWarnings.description: Report warning-level advisories to Bun (causes install prompt). Set to false to print warnings without prompting.

disableBatch.description: Disable batch queries (use individual queries instead)

hono.reason: Project does not use JWT from hono

lodash.reason: Temporary ignore while migration is in progress
